title: Chinese Developer Sentenced for Cyberattacks
description: David Lu, a Chinese software developer, was sentenced to four years in prison for deploying malware against his former U.S. employer.

title: Google Tightens Developer Verification for Android
description: Starting in 2026, Google will require identity verification for developers distributing apps outside the Play Storeâ€”extending beyond certification on Android devices. An early-access phase begins in October 2025, full rollout by March 2026, and enforcement starts in regions like Brazil, Indonesia, Singapore, and Thailand later that year.

title: VS Code's Latest Update Elevates Development Workflow
description: The newest release of Visual Studio Code auto-starts MCP servers, offers support for Git worktrees, and introduces the ability to checkpoint and restore Copilot chat sessions, enhancing collaboration and session continuity.
